mapper.select:
/*LALM0117Mapper.LALM0117_selDormacUserList_20221103_추가*/ SELECT MWN.TRMN_AMNNO AS VIEW_CODE , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN BDM.MB_INTG_NM ELSE SUBSTR(BDM.MB_INTG_NM,1,1) || LPAD('*',LENGTH(BDM.MB_INTG_NM)-2, '*') || SUBSTR(BDM.MB_INTG_NM, LENGTH(BDM.MB_INTG_NM), 1) END MB_INTG_NM , BDM.MB_RLNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN BDM.MB_MPNO ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(BDM.MB_MPNO, '(.{3})(.*)(.{4})', '\1-****-\3') END MB_MPNO , MWN.DONGUP , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN MWN.DONGBW ELSE LPAD(' ', LENGTH(MWN.DONGBW), '*') END DONGBW , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MBT.DORMACC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DORMACC_DT , TO_CHAR(MBT.FNCON_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNCON_DTM , MBT.MB_INTG_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_BK_DORM_MBINTG BDM INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BK_DORM_MWMN MWN ON(BDM.MB_INTG_NO = MWN.MB_INTG_NO AND MWN.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MBINTG MBT ON(BDM.MB_INTG_NO = MBT.MB_INTG_NO AND MBT.DORMACC_YN = '1' AND MBT.DELACC_YN = '0' ) WHERE 1=1
AND BDM.MB_INTG_NM LIKE '%' || #{mb_intg_nm} || '%'

/*LALM0117Mapper.LALM0117_selDormacFhsList_20221103_추가*/ SELECT FHS.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || FHS.FARM_AMNNO AS VIEW_CODE , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN BDM.MB_INTG_NM ELSE SUBSTR(BDM.MB_INTG_NM,1,1) || LPAD('*',LENGTH(BDM.MB_INTG_NM)-2, '*') || SUBSTR(BDM.MB_INTG_NM, LENGTH(BDM.MB_INTG_NM), 1) END MB_INTG_NM , BDM.MB_RLNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN BDM.MB_MPNO ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(BDM.MB_MPNO, '(.{3})(.*)(.{4})', '\1-****-\3') END MB_MPNO , FHS.DONGUP , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN FHS.DONGBW ELSE LPAD(' ', LENGTH(FHS.DONGBW), '*') END DONGBW , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MBT.DORMACC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DORMACC_DT , TO_CHAR(MBT.FNCON_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNCON_DTM , MBT.MB_INTG_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_BK_DORM_MBINTG BDM INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BK_DORM_FHS FHS ON(BDM.MB_INTG_NO = FHS.MB_INTG_NO AND FHS.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MBINTG MBT ON(BDM.MB_INTG_NO = MBT.MB_INTG_NO AND MBT.DORMACC_YN = '1' AND MBT.DELACC_YN = '0' ) WHERE 1=1
AND BDM.MB_INTG_NM LIKE '%' || #{mb_intg_nm} || '%'
mapper.update: /*LALM0117Mapper.LALM0117_updSecessionMwmnDelAccYn_20221110_추가*/ UPDATE TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN SET DEL_YN = '1' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_CMENO = #{ss_userid} , SRA_MWMNNM = '***' , FRLNO = '***' , ZIP = '***' , DONGUP = '***' , DONGBW = '***' , OHSE_TELNO = '***' , CUS_MPNO = '***' , CUS_RLNO = '***' , RMK_CNTN = '***' WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmn_amnno}

/*LALM0117Mapper.LALM0117_delSecessionMbintgDelAccYn_20221111_추가*/ UPDATE TB_LA_IS_MM_MBINTG SET DELACC_YN = '1' , DELACC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_CMENO = #{ss_userid} , MB_INTG_NM = '***' , MB_RLNO = '***' , OHSE_TELNO = '***' , MB_MPNO = '***' WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{mb_intg_no}
